node.address: Centro Calle Roman # 5-45, Centro Calle Roman # 5-45 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Located in the exclusive Calle Roman, two blocks from the clock tower, is an emblematic colonial house.

Dormitories with 8 single beds, anti-mite orthopedic mattress, air conditioning at 25 ° C without time restriction, locker. Towel and body soap.

Typical breakfast of the Caribbean: Cayeye, patacones, ñanes, eggs with hogao, sesame horchata, coffee.

Dining room Smart tv and balcony to the street.

Filter and water ozonizer for free consumption, free coffee station, free pass printing.

We have designed free experiences of exclusive flavors for our guests:
- Pairing chocolate and rum tobacco. A great sensory experience with this American trilogy, the spices of tobacco, the bitterness of chocolate and the sweetness of rum.
- Tasting of Pre-Columbian flavors, a tour with the indigenous ancestors around manioc or cassava from their preparations to the sweets accompanied by cold coffee.
- And you can not miss, a tasting of the endemic fruits: suckers, gooseberries, guama, papaya, mamey.
At the hostel the rooms have a shared bathroom with a shower.
An American breakfast is available each morning at Hostal Casa Roman.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cartagena's Gold Museum, Palace of the Inquisition and Cartagena's Walls. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 6 km from Hostal Casa Roman.
Centro is a great choice for travellers interested in restaurants, architecture and food.

description.description: Situated in Cartagena de Indias and with Bolivar Park reachable within less than 1 km, Hostal Casa Roman features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a bar, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. The property is around 2 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, 5 km from Steps of La Popa Mount and 1.1 km from Cartagena's Modern Art Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.
